background.prompt: A serene and inviting forest golf course scene bathed in warm golden tones, showcasing the natural beauty of the landscape. The lush green fairways are framed by tall trees, with dappled sunlight filtering through the leaves, creating a tranquil atmosphere. In the distance, small figures of Korean golfers can be seen, their presence understated and not the main focus, allowing the stunning scenery to take center stage. The composition should reflect a professional commercial photography style, capturing the essence of an authentic Korean golf course setting. This image should be ultra-realistic and in 8K resolution, designed specifically for a wide landscape format, suitable as a KakaoTalk profile background. The theme of "감성의 비거리 – 스윙과 마음의 연결" resonates through the calmness of the environment, emphasizing the connection between the swing and the heart, perfectly aligned with the brand strategy for local senior customers.

profile.prompt: A senior Korean golfer aged between 50-70, showcasing Asian facial features and silver/gray hair, striking a confident pose in a serene forest setting. The image should exude a warm golden tone, capturing an emotional atmosphere that reflects the theme "비거리의 감성 – 스윙과 마음의 연결." The golfer is the main subject, framed in a square format, ideal for a KakaoTalk profile image. The composition should be ultra-realistic and photorealistic, with professional commercial photography style, set in a natural Korean golf course environment that embodies an authentic Korean atmosphere. The lighting and composition must be expertly crafted to resonate with local customers, emphasizing a high brand weight and a warm audience temperature. Ensure no Western or Caucasian individuals are present in the scene.

background.prompt: A modern indoor fitting room designed for golf enthusiasts, featuring advanced AI equipment in a cool blue-gray tone. The scene captures a sleek, high-tech environment with minimalist decor and soft, professional lighting that emphasizes the authenticity of the Korean golfing experience. In the background, small figures of Korean golfers can be seen at a distance, engaged in a practice swing, subtly highlighting the connection between swing and emotion, in line with the weekly theme "비거리의 감성 – 스윙과 마음의 연결." The overall composition is clean and focuses on the interior space, creating a photorealistic image suitable for a KakaoTalk profile background in a wide landscape format (16:9). The atmosphere is warm and inviting, targeting local customers who are tech enthusiasts, adhering to the brand strategy for balanced customer engagement.

profile.prompt: A young Korean golfer, aged between 30-50 years, featuring distinct Asian facial features, stands confidently in a fitting room background that exudes a technical atmosphere. The image captures a cool blue-gray tone, emphasizing innovation and a modern aesthetic. The golfer is the central subject, showcasing a poised swing that symbolizes the connection between technique and mindset, aligned with the weekly theme "비거리의 감성 – 스윙과 마음의 연결." The composition is ultra-realistic and photorealistic, shot in high quality (8K resolution), with professional lighting that highlights the golfer's form and expression. The setting reflects an authentic Korean atmosphere, ensuring a clean composition suitable for a KakaoTalk profile image, with no text overlays or promotional content, presented in a square format (1:1) for optimal viewing on the platform.

account1.imagePrompt: A warm golden-toned image of a Korean senior golfer, aged 50-70, with silver/gray hair, showcasing a powerful golf swing on a picturesque Korean golf course. The golfer has Asian facial features, exuding a deep emotional connection to the game, embodying the theme of "비거리의 감성 – 스윙과 마음의 연결." In the foreground, the elegant "MASSGOO" store sign is subtly integrated into the architecture of a nearby fitting room, with a clean interior displaying high-end golf drivers and equipment. The setting captures an authentic Korean atmosphere with professional lighting and composition, optimized for KakaoTalk's square feed format. The golfer wears a stylish cap featuring the "MASSGOO" logo, embroidered naturally, ensuring brand visibility while keeping the focus on the golfer's form and emotion. The scene embodies a warm, inviting vibe, appealing to local customers and enhancing the brand identity.
account1.caption: 당신만의 드라이버를 찾아보세요

account2.imagePrompt: A warm scene featuring a Korean golfer aged between 30-50, with distinct Asian facial features, engaged in a fitting consultation at a modern golf shop. The golfer is discussing and reviewing a driver with a professional fitter, both appearing focused and enthusiastic. The setting is a sleek, well-lit interior of the MASSGOO store, showcasing various golf equipment and accessories. The MASSGOO logo is subtly integrated into the architecture, visible on the walls and displays, creating an authentic atmosphere without overwhelming the main subjects. The color palette is cool with blue-gray tones, enhancing the innovative vibe of the scene. This image aligns with the weekly theme of "비거리의 감성 – 스윙과 마음의 연결," highlighting the emotional connection between the golfer's swing and their mindset. The composition is ultra-realistic, capturing the essence of a professional commercial photography style, and is optimized for a square format suitable for KakaoTalk feeds, ensuring a clean and engaging visual without any text overlays or watermarks.
account2.caption: 당신만의 드라이버를 찾는 여정을 시작하세요
